definition: surname Luo/old name of several rivers (in Henan, Shaanxi, Sichuan and Anhui)
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])
Caltrop or puncture vine (Tribulus terrestris)/to thatch (a roof)
